sn51.15:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
sn51.15:1.3: Atha kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn51.15:1.4: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
sn51.15:1.5: “kimatthiyaṁ nu kho, bho ānanda, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṁ vussatī”ti?
sn51.15:2.1: “Atthi pana, bho ānanda, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti?
sn51.15:2.2: “Atthi kho, brāhmaṇa, maggo, atthi paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti.
sn51.15:3.1: “Katamo pana, bho ānanda, maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti?
sn51.15:3.6: ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti.
sn51.15:4.1: “Evaṁ sante, bho ānanda, santakaṁ hoti no asantakaṁ.
sn51.15:4.3: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi. Yathā te khameyya tathā taṁ byākareyyāsi.
sn51.15:4.6: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yo tajjo chando so paṭippassaddho”ti?
sn51.15:4.9: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yaṁ tajjaṁ vīriyaṁ taṁ paṭippassaddhan”ti?
sn51.15:4.12: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yaṁ tajjaṁ cittaṁ taṁ paṭippassaddhan”ti?
sn51.15:4.15: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yā tajjā vīmaṁsā sā paṭippassaddhā”ti?
sn51.15:5.1: “Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, yo so bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto, tassa yo pubbe chando ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yo tajjo chando so paṭippassaddho;
sn51.15:5.2: yaṁ pubbe vīriyaṁ ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yaṁ tajjaṁ vīriyaṁ taṁ paṭippassaddhaṁ;
sn51.15:5.3: yaṁ pubbe cittaṁ ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yaṁ tajjaṁ cittaṁ taṁ paṭippassaddhaṁ;
sn51.15:5.4: yā pubbe vīmaṁsā ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yā tajjā vīmaṁsā sā paṭippassaddhā.
sn51.15:5.6: iti evaṁ sante, santakaṁ vā hoti no asantakaṁ vā”ti?
sn51.15:6.1: “Addhā, bho ānanda, evaṁ sante, santakaṁ hoti no asantakaṁ.
sn51.15:6.2: Abhikkantaṁ, bho ānanda, abhikkantaṁ, bho ānanda.
sn51.15:6.3: Seyyathāpi, bho ānanda, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṁ bhotā ānandena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn51.15:6.4: Esāhaṁ, bho ānanda, taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn51.15:6.5: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ ānando dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
